caption.title: Time evolution of the average distance of infected nodes from the center of the lattice in network A.
caption.p: The infection rate is Î» = 0.24. Initially, 16 nodes in the center of network A are infected. The density of interconnection links is q = 1. The spatial length is R = 1. The network size is N = 10000. The results have been averaged over 100 realizations.
